section.title: Usage statistics sent by RFT
section.para: The following usage statistics are sent by default in a UDP packet at the end of life time of each RFT Resource (or when a RFT resource is destroyed).

listitem.simpara: Total number of files transferred by RFT since RFT was installed
Total number of bytes transferred by RFT since RFT was installed
Total number of files transferred in this RFT Resource
Total number of bytes transferred in this RFT Resource
Creation time of this RFT Resource

section.para: We have made a concerted effort to collect only data that is not too intrusive or private, and yet still provides us with information that will help improve the RFT component. Nevertheless, if you wish to disable this feature, please see the "Usage Statistics Configuration" section of for instructions.
Also, please see our policy statement on the collection of usage statistics.
